OS_UPDATES.TITLE: OS Updates
OS_UPDATES.SCHEDULE_INFORMATION: Updates are scanned every 6 hours, but can be manually scanned 5 times every 10 minutes

BUTTON.TOOLTIP: Updates are scanned every 6 hours, but can be manually scanned 5 times every 10 minutes

INFO.TITLE: Refreshing Updates
INFO.MSG: Batuta is refreshing the pending OS Updates. This procedure can take a couple seconds to complete.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Refreshed Updates
SUCCESS.MSG: Scanned all hosts for pending OS Updates.

ERROR.TITLE: Could Not Refresh Updates
ERROR.MSG: Batuta encountered an error while trying to refresh the pending OS Updates. Please try again later.
